channel.title: letters on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in letters on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Day
item.description: (transcribed 6:09pm CST Saturday 25 January 2003) 3:10 P.M. April 5 Yesterday when I called Christina she was gone. When I called Charmain, she didn't want to do anything. so I rode around at the school. Today I went to church. Jessica, Cheri, and Emily were there. We talked about AIDS. Dad brought some rubbers there to show us them and teach us about "safe sex." As if we don't know.

item.title: letters
item.description: (transcribed 5:29pm CST Thursday 23 January 2003) 10:25 I just wrote 2 letters. To Christy and Erika. I just got one from Lila. You know what? Lila is awesome! I love her personality and she's into guys and sex and she gives good back massages... Wow! And I'm gonna get her at OKC. I can't believe she's 15 though. I would swear she's older than me. goodnight. 10:28
